greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of integer solutions to a^2 + b^2 + c^2 + 7*d^2 = n.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: G.f.: theta_3(q)^3*theta_3(q^7), where theta_3() is the Jacobi theta function. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 01 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 16 2014
